faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Some common questions customers often ask

items.q: How do I book an appointment?
items.a: You can book an appointment online through our website or mobile app. Just choose a doctor, a suitable time, and confirm the booking.

items.q: How much does a consultation cost?
items.a: The consultation fee depends on the department and doctor. You can view the detailed fee on each doctor's information page.
Yes, you can cancel an appointment at least 24 hours in advance without a fee. Later cancellations may incur charges.
We accept payments through common health insurance providers. Please contact us for more details.

cta.title: Need Emergency Support?
cta.desc: Our 24/7 support team is always ready to assist you
